abiDocs.name: multiTransfer
abiDocs.details: Implements transfer method for multiple recipient. Needed in LBRS token distribution process after ICO

abiDocs.name: tokenBalance
abiDocs.details: Returns LBRS token balance of contract.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
